Verses: 1 sagodharare, Oruvan Yaadhoru Kutraththil Agappattaal, Aavikkuriyavargalaagiya Neengal Saandhamulla Aaviyode Appadippattavanai Seerporundhappannungal; Neeyum Sodhikkappadaadhapadikku Unnaikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayiru.
2 oruvar Baaraththai Oruvar Sumandhu, Ippadiye Kiristhuvinudaiya Piramaanaththai Niraivetrungal.
3 oruvan, Thaan Ondrumillaadhirundhum, Thannai Oru Poruttendru Enninaal, Thannaiththaane Vanjikkiravanaavaan.
4 avanavan Thanthan Suyakiriyaiyai Sodhiththuppaarkkakkadavan; Appozhudhu Matravanaip Paarkkumbodhalla, Thannaiye Paarkkumbodhu Menmaipaaraatta Avanukku Idamundaagum.
6 melum, Thiruvasanaththil Ubadhesikkappadugiravan Ubadhesikkiravanukku Sagala Nanmaigalilum Pagirndhu Kodukkakkadavan.
7 mosampogaadhirungal, Dhevan Thammaip Pariyaasampannavottaar; Manushan Edhai Vidhaikkiraano Adhaiye Aruppaan.
8 than Maamsaththirkendru Vidhaikkiravan Maamsaththinaal Azhivai Aruppaan; Aavikkendru Vidhaikkiravan Aaviyinaale Niththiyajeevanai Aruppaan.
9 nanmaiseygiradhil Sorndhupogaamal Iruppomaaga; Naam Thalarndhupogaadhirundhaal Etrakaalaththil Aruppom.
10 aagaiyaal Namakkuk Kidaikkum Samayaththirkuththakkadhaaga, Yaavarukkum, Viseshamaaga Visuvaasa Kudumbaththaargalukkum, Nanmaiseyyakkadavom.

12 maamsaththinpadi Nalveshamaaik Kaanappada Virumbugiravargal Evargalo, Avargal Thaangal Kiristhuvinudaiya Siluvaiyinimiththam Thunbappadaadhapadikke Ungalai Viruththasedhanampannikkollak Kattaayampannugiraargal.

13 viruththasedhanam Adaindhirukkira Avargalum Niyaayappiramaanaththaik Kaikkollaamalirukkiraargal; Appadiyirundhum, Avargal Ungal Maamsaththaikkuriththu Menmaipaaraattumpadikku Neengal Viruththasedhanampannikkollavendumendru Virumbugiraargal.

14 naano Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Siluvaiyaik Kuriththeyallaamal Verondraiyung Kuriththu Menmaipaaraattaadhiruppenaaga; Avaraal Ulagam Enakkuch Chiluvaiyilaraiyundirukkiradhu, Naanum Ulagaththirkuch Chiluvaiyilaraiyundirukkiren.
15 kiristhu Yesuvukkul Viruththasedhanamum Ondrumillai, Viruththasedhanamillaamaiyum Ondrumillai; Pudhu Sirushtiye Kaariyam.
16 indhap Piramaanaththinpadi Nadandhuvarugiravargal Evargalo, Avargalukkum, Dhevanudaiya Isravelarukkum, Samaadhaanamum Irakkamum Undaayiruppadhaaga.
17 inimel Oruvanum Enakku Varuththam Undaakkaadhiruppaanaaga; Karththaraagiya Yesuvinudaiya Achchadaiyaalangalai Naan En Sareeraththile Thariththukkondirukkiren.
18 sagodharare, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Kirubai Ungal Aaviyudanekooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
